file.description: A single file, supplied in the multipart/form-data encoding and contained within the given boundaries.

deal_id.description: ID of the deal to associate file(s) with

person_id.description: ID of the person to associate file(s) with

org_id.description: ID of the organization to associate file(s) with

product_id.description: ID of the product to associate file(s) with

activity_id.description: ID of the activity to associate file(s) with
